text:
A fresh batch of a Sanskrit correspondence course conducted by the Samskrita Bharati would begin on March 6 and registrations for the course would be held the same day at Sri Akilandeswari Vidyalaya at Ganapathi Nagar in the city.

The course is conducted in Tamil and English medium and people above the age of 13 are eligible to participate. Prior knowledge of Sanskrit is not required. Contact classes would be conducted on Sundays. The course fee is Rs.300. Those interested can appear in person and register their names and attend the class the same day, a press release from Samskrita Bharathi said. For more details, dial 9443722042/9884104024.
title: Sanskrit course
